title: The PBE
body: Riot why is it so hard to get a PBE account Im an active lvl30 account and signed up today. What am i doing Wrong?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: at least u dont wait since season 4 so ... And im not flaming or afk or things like that .{{item:3113}} {{item:3070}}

PBE access is granted on a number of ever-changing and dynamic criteria. For the most part, we look for players who are active and are a positive influence on the community. Sometimes we've sent out batches of invites based on playstyle (i.e. if we were going to rework Ryze, we sent out invites to Ryze mains), but it changes quite often. For complete details, check out our [PBE FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

Let me know if you have any questions.
